colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,'DI NI KUN MKHYEN BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES RJE GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO LA GNANG BA DANG, YANG RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSUNG SGO MA PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG MCHOG GRUB @003B KYIS ZIN THOR BKOD PA BZHIN, PHYAG LEN DANG DMIGS RIM SOGS GSAL BAR BGYIS TE BKOD PA YIN NO, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN MO'I DUS MIN GYI KHA CHAR BCAD PA'I MAN NGAG ME RLUNG 'KHYIL BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHYI L CHAR BA HA CANG CHE SKABS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
